title: How to Attract a Capricorn Man As a Pisces Woman

steps.title: Capricorns are fairly introverted and don't usually approach new people.
steps.content: Capricorns are fairly introverted and don't usually approach new people. He has a small group of close friends and is pretty picky about who he brings into his circle. [1] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. It's up to you to convince him there's room for you by your side—luckily, Pisces ladies have no trouble making friends! Introduce yourself and add something that puts you in context for him. For example, you might say, "Hi, I'm Sarah. We're in the same history class. That was a really insightful comment you made last week." Keep in mind that Capricorns typically aren't fond of small talk. If you go over to him but don't have anything specific to talk about, he's likely to get bored pretty quickly and move on.

steps.title: He'll love getting to know the real you.
steps.content: He'll love getting to know the real you. There are some pretty big differences between your signs—as a Pisces, you tend to have your head in the clouds while he's more down to earth—but you're both honest, hard-working people. He'll appreciate how kind you are and how you devote yourself to those around you. [2] X Research source You're known for being a caring soul who dedicates yourself to fulfilling the needs of others. A Capricorn is the same way with his close circle of friends and family, so he'll really admire this about you. He'll also enjoy your intelligence and creative spark. Don't be afraid to share your ideas with him, you'll give him inspiration.

steps.title: Any Capricorn will pay attention to a woman who can make him laugh.
steps.content: Any Capricorn will pay attention to a woman who can make him laugh. On the outside, he seems really serious—but he does love someone who understands his sense of humor. [3] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. This is your chance to shine, Pisces. While some might consider your humor an acquired taste, your dry wit will crack up your favorite Capricorn guy. Capricorns aren't always the best at keeping up a text conversation. If he goes radio silent after you've texted back and forth a few times, a funny meme is a great way to break the ice.

steps.title: Capricorn guys love to feel needed and share their guidance.
steps.content: Capricorn guys love to feel needed and share their guidance. A Capricorn is born to lead. He's also hard-working and responsible—if you ask him for something, he'll quickly come to your aid. [4] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Since the two of you likely have very different interests, it shouldn't be too hard for you to find something you're clueless about that he happens to be an expert in. For example, if he's a finance major and you're having a hard time with an economics assignment, shoot him a text—he'll be happy to explain it to you and help you out. Don't be surprised if he follows up with you later and asks if you've had any further problems. Once he's helped fix something, he wants to make sure it stays fixed.

steps.title: Your Goat is more comfortable taking the reins.
steps.content: Your Goat is more comfortable taking the reins. He likes to make about dates and plans because he's so cautious and particular about things. Since, as a Pisces, you tend to be more submissive in a relationship, this is probably exactly what you want. He'll love that you let him take charge and don't try to take over. Rest assured that your Capricorn guy cares a lot about your wants and needs and will always take them into consideration when making his decisions. If you ever disagree with anything, though, speak up! He'll learn from it and apply that information next time. He also cares about your boundaries and isn't going to do anything that puts you on the spot or makes you feel uncomfortable. When he cares about you, he's very protective of you—exactly what a Pisces wants in a partner.

steps.title: A strong, masculine Capricorn loves a soft feminine woman.
steps.content: A strong, masculine Capricorn loves a soft feminine woman. As a Pisces Mermaid, you are one of the most feminine signs in the zodiac—and this trait will definitely serve you well in your quest to conquer a Capricorn man. Take care to dress in soft, flowing fabrics that accentuate your features whenever you're around him, and he won't be able to take his eyes off you. Your feminine softness extends beyond your appearance to your general demeanor as well. He'll love how kind and nurturing you are to anyone who crosses your path. If you dream of becoming a mother someday, don't hesitate to tell him about it. Capricorns tend to be fairly traditional, so it's likely he's looking to start a family at some point as well.

steps.title: Capricorns care deeply about their inner circle and want their approval.
steps.content: Capricorns care deeply about their inner circle and want their approval. When you start to get serious with him, there's no doubt he'll ask his friends and family about you. If they all love you as well, he'll have no doubt you're the one for him. As a Pisces, you tend to treat everyone with such kindness, this should be no problem for you—a few conversations and they'll adore you. You also want to make sure his friends have the opportunity to hang out with the two of you together. They'll be more certain about the relationship if they see the effect you have on him. While you do have your differences, it'll be clear how well the two of you fit.

steps.title: An introverted Capricorn needs time by himself to recharge.
steps.content: An introverted Capricorn needs time by himself to recharge. Pisces is perhaps the most introverted sign in the zodiac, so you understand this need all too well. Since you both have similar needs, you complement each other in this regard—and neither of you will ever have to worry about not getting the time and space you need. Even though Capricorns don't always express how they feel, you'll easily be able to pick up on the signs that he's socially overloaded and needs some peace and quiet. Watch for him to withdraw to a quiet corner, seem distracted, or respond to you with short answers. If you mention that you have the same need and that you understand him, he'll feel like he's found his soulmate. He'll never want to leave your side if he feels that you understand him this deeply.

steps.title: Goats tend to keep their feelings hidden until they feel comfortable.
steps.content: Goats tend to keep their feelings hidden until they feel comfortable. Because he's an Earth sign, he prefers to focus on practical things—and he just doesn't find emotions very practical. Being a Pisces woman who is usually very in touch with your emotions, you might find this tendency frustrating. He'll come around—you just have to be patient with him. [5] X Research source Do everything you can to make him feel safe and comfortable with you and he might open up sooner. When he sees how kind and gentle you are, he'll know he can trust you with his heart. Reader Poll: We asked 419 wikiHow readers what type of compatibilities are most important in a relationship, and 45% of them said emotional and trust. [Take Poll]

steps.title: Capricorns love things that are well-made and personal.
steps.content: Capricorns love things that are well-made and personal. [6] X Research source As the givers of the zodiac, Pisces ladies are known for their great gifts. You might think your frugal Capricorn man is hard to shop for, but all it takes is a personal touch. If he sees that you've put a lot of effort into the gift, you'll have his heart. For example, you might find out his favorite book, then hunt down a rare first edition—even better, one that was signed by the author. Well-made items that he'll use often also top the list. If he's a writer, you might look for a particularly well-made pen. Does he wear suits to work? Maybe get him a custom-tailored suit coat.

steps.title: A Capricorn guy needs a dedicated and loyal partner.
steps.content: A Capricorn guy needs a dedicated and loyal partner. He wants to know that you'll stand by him through thick and thin. If he has to worry that you'll back out of the relationship if the going gets tough, he probably won't hang around for very long. Fortunately, you Pisces ladies tend to be super nurturing, so you should have no trouble giving him the support he needs. [7] X Research source Capricorn guys don't tend to express their emotions (or their emotional needs) very well—or at all. That means you have to intuit a lot of what he might be looking for in a partner. But as one of the most intuitive signs in the zodiac, you've got that down. When you find the right ways to support him, he'll never want you to leave his side. Your intuitive, caring nature makes you the perfect partner for him because he doesn't have to spell everything out.
